originalText.text: all im willing to say is dr alan frascoia isnt what hes hyped up to be... listen to your child before you confide into him, your child wont lead you wrong but he will. i also dont this that placing a child thats still fairly new to the state outside of the home is a good idea either.

originalText.text: theyve normalized sending kids to state hospitals without even trying to work with them. the amount of children getting sent to the state hospitals via bellevue is insanely high. and thats not something to brag about. those places scar kids for life and end up doing the exact opposite of what theyre supposed to do

originalText.text: My son is 16 now he has been seeing the head of pediatric and child psychiatry for five years the doctor Dr. Schlecter is as good as any psychiatrist I have ever seen I am 65 years old and the treatment there is warm and friendly the doctor is amazing that’s all I have to say how it gets these low marks to meet this something wrong with these people
